analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is essential to investigate and resolve the issues causing the failure to ensure a smooth user experience. (Recommendation: Review server logs, network requests, and page structure to identify bottlenecks and optimize performance.)

issues.message: The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is essential to investigate and resolve the issues causing the failure to ensure a smooth user experience. (Recommendation
issues.recommendation: Review server logs, network requests, and page structure to identify bottlenecks and optimize performance.)

issues.message: The Time to First Byte (TTFB) for the homepage is relatively high at 87.3 ms. Although it is within the acceptable range, reducing TTFB can improve user experience. (Recommendation
issues.recommendation: Optimize server-side processing, minimize database queries, and enable caching.)

issues.message: The First Contentful Paint (FCP) for the pricing page is higher than the other pages. While it is within an acceptable range, it could be improved. (Recommendation
issues.recommendation: Optimize and prioritize the rendering of above-the-fold content.)

insights: The blog page has the lowest load time and TTFB among the passed tests, indicating efficient optimization and server-side processing.
The homepage has a longer load time than the pricing and blog pages, suggesting room for improvement in optimizing above-the-fold content and server-side processing.
The FCP for the pricing page is significantly higher than the TTFB, indicating that optimizing the rendering of above-the-fold content could provide a quicker perceived loading time.
